1131.content:
Grabbing his duffel bag, Scott left the house after waving goodbye to his mom. He hadn't told his family about his new.....condition yet and he hoped to god that it never comes time to reveal what he had become. He shivered remembering the first time he transformed. The pain, the heat, the feeling of absolute power that came with the change that time was something he could never forget until morning came then he changed back into his human form and was alone in the middle of the woods in his birthday suit.

That what the duffel bag was for as he packed plenty of spare clothing, a compass, a piece of incense, a portable phone charger, and mountain ash as precaution if his transformation gets out of hand.

Walking out to the woods behind his neighborhood, he ran through the thick underbrush into a isolated clearing that was far away from civilization. This was the first place he transformed into a werewolf, so it was a special place for him to come out and be alone when his other half needed to be let out. He could already feel the moon humming, calling out to his bestial half as twilight crept over the forest. "Soon." Scott murmured and stripped off his clothes.

He stashed the duffel bag into a hollow tree as the change began to occur.

Scott growled. Literally growled as heat spread throughout his body then came the pain and he fell to the forest floor. It started with his bones as they cracked, broke, and reformed themselves into something not part of the human anatomy. His muscles tore themselves apart as they stretched, strengthened, and hardened into steel bands resembling muscle. His skin sprouted fur from every pore as it stretched and tore. Claws exploded from his fingers and toes as his transformation neared its end. Scott roared as his jaw stretched and razor sharp fangs burst from his gums with his head elongating into that of a wolf. Finally his transformation was complete and a great black beast with golden predatory eyes stood where the man known as Scott had been before.

It howled into the night. The joy in it unmistakable as every animal either fled or hid away from the terrifying creature that now prowled through the dark forest. The werewolf sprinted out of the forest, searching for its next meal.

As the beast vanished into the depths of the forests, a paranormal research club entered the outskirts of the forest. These students were from the nearby college investigating the strange howls that came from the forest during the full moon. The group was chattering with excitement as their leader, a rather nerdy guy with night-vision goggles and a camera called out the other four members.

"Alright ladies and gentleman, we the members of the Paranormal and Supernatural Discovery Club will finally capture real footage of the elusive beast of Trinity that stock these woods on the night of the full moon. I, Mike Jackson, shall lead the search for the beast," He had the camera pointed at himself for the introduction then panned out to other members. "with the help of my second-in-command, Stephanie Dresden" he zoomed onto a pretty redhead wearing large glasses. "Our tracker, John Oliver" he turned to the dark-hair young man with a bored look on his face. "Our benefactor, Mrs. Pitt" He swung the camera towards the only adult in the group (their driver too) and centered on a dark-haired women in her mid-thirties that was still waiting in the car. She waved as Mike swung the camera to the last and the most remarkable member of the group, a young blonde woman that was armed with a crossbow and a silver knife, "the only woman who has rejected more times than any other man, woman, and child on earth, Fiona Argent."

Fiona snorted at Mike's comment then he turned the camera back to himself, "We will be the first to dare trek these woods to find the source of recent string of animal mauling. Local police have been baffled as the beast seems to disappear without a trace and only appears on the night of the full moon." Mike clipped the camera to the side of his night vision goggles then announced "Now we shall begin the search for the Beast of Trinity."
1131.title: Full Moon Tonight

11311.content:
Scott felt that he was having a very vivid dream. He knew that this wasn't actually a dream as he could feel his claws digging into the earth, smell the tangled web of scents of the forest, and see through the darkness with crystal clarity but it felt like everything was happening to someone else and he was just along for the ride. A growl rumbled through his chest as he caught the scent of something up ahead.

Sliding to a stop, Scott growled again as a bear came ambling out of the trees ahead of him. The bear froze at the sight of the strange creature in front of it then following the thought of fight or flight, the bear choose "FIGHT.

The bear roared then charged at Scott as he roared back in challenge and leapt at the brown behemoth. Both collided in a spray of mud, claws and fangs flying, impossibly fast, black and brown clashing in a deadly tangle of death. Fur flew as both beasts, one primal and one supernatural, ripped ribbons out of each other as blood sprayed as they tore into each others flesh and painted the surroundings in a macabre of crimson. The bear swung its thick arm, sending Scott flying into a tree. His back made an audible crack as he collapsed at the base, the air knocked out of him but now he was getting angry.

It swung once again but Scott was ready and ducked beneath the bear's wild swing then stabbed his own claws deep into the bear's armpit. It howled in pain as his claws cut through layers of fur, fat, and muscle until he reached down to the bone. The bear went wild with the surge of pain, trying to dislodge Scott but he held on even tighter to the bear's side. Wrapping his fingers around the socket, Scott pulled with his bestial strength and ripped the bear's arm off. Screaming in pain, the bear fell away from Scott as he howled in triumph then started beating the bear back with its own arm with sadistic joy. The bear tried to run away from the monster that was beating it but the blood lost and missing appendage slowed the bear down and Scott kept attacking it till the bear finally breathed its last breath.

Scott howled once more as he could feel that his wounds were already stitching themselves back together thanks to a werewolf incredible regeneration. Werewolves weren't immortal, just a lot tougher to kill thanks to their strength and regeneration. But all that power and healing needed energy, hence werewolves whether in human form or changed are in a constant state of hunger to fuel their enhanced abilities. Scott began to eat the remains of the bear to refuel himself for the next fight.

After his meal, Scott tore back into the night in search of more prey. His instincts were on overdrive after the fight with the bear so when he sensed something amiss in the forest, he came to a stop. Sniffing the air, he detected something out of place in the forest.

What did he smell?

15412222.content: Okey here's what happened sense last night, after my family was rescued by Dad's henchmen, Mom, John and I(sort of) made a pact with Greywolf and his pack and in return they'll protect us from further home invasions like that, we moved to a new house that's heavily patrolled by the pack and now I'm on patrol, I went on a rooftop run keeping an eye out for local criminals and darkwolves, but as I gone near the police station near downtown, trouble found me. a ninja dressed in blue suddenly sideswipes me with a kick knocking me off the roof, as I tried to get up it threw a shirkin at me missing me purposely "Don't move wolf demon or the next shirkin I'll throw won't miss." He said "Don't you know a werewolf if you see one? Who are you and what do you want?" I asked "I know of werewolves and they're demons, as for who I am, I'm Tsunami and I'm hired by Mr. Gambell to slay one." He takes out a katana but the metal isn't steel it's silver. "Prepare to meet your end." He says, he tries to slash me but I manage to quickly evade each attack. "Impressive moves," He said, "But your only tire yourself out." I sensed that he and I arn't alone, looking up I see...
15412222.title: The next night.

154122221.content: Your out of breath but as Tsunami is about to finish you off, you see two pack members on the roof behind him, one of them(Shadow) drops down the fire escape, taps Tsunami on the shoulder, "What?" he says before receiving a punch from him "Ooh, you'll pay for that." He says Shaodw retreats back to the roof and Tsunami follows him only to receive a kick from a 3rd. pack member, he lands on the wall behind him, knocking him out temporary. Shadow and anoter she-wolf(Moondancer) watches Tsunami as the 3rd. werewolf(striker) helps you up "You okey?" He asks and I respond ""Careful, he's welding a silver sword." Tsunami stands up "This is between me and her," he points to you, "This is none of your concerns." I say "They're part of the pack." Striker says "We always look over our packmates," Moondancer says "If you mess with one of us." Shadow says "You mess with all of us." Tsunami unsheaths his sword "Then so be it!" we all go into a combat stance. he begins slashing at Striker he dodges his attacks and lands a few strikers of his own. He then attacks Moondancer but only met with a clawed foot low sweep slashing his legs "Ahhh." he started to back into Shadow, he uses his talon like hands, impaled him in the back instantly killing him. Stiker searchs his corpse and finds a letter "Hmm, he is called Tsunami." he looks at Shadow, "It seems you downgraded him to a tropical depression." Moondancer, Shadow and I chuckled at his joke. "Seriously it says to slay a werewolf and display it on a tree as a message to Greywolf and it's from Victor Gambill." You say "Nice try dad, but no way I'm going back." You take out a camera out of your fannypack and take a picture of Tsunami's corps. "Sending this to dad." you say.
154122221.title: three to the rescue.

1541222211.content:
You, Shadow, Moondancer and Striker head for Greywolf's cave, he says "Why are you here? The meeting is over." Shadow says "Misty was attacked, by a ninja." "A ninja?" says Greywolf. You take out your camera and show it to Greywolf while Striker shows the letter, "Tsunami eh? It seems that Gambell is getting desperate to hire him. You two amaze even me. Ninjas are normally hard to kill but you made it look easy. Hang on, be right back." He goes into the back and come back with a letter and envelope and give them both to me "Mail this to your father along with the photo." I read the letter.

MR. GAMBELL

IF THAT'S THE BEST YOU GOT, YOUR IN TROUBLE. MY PACK HAS SKILLS THAT OUTCLASSED YOUR NINJA ASSASSIN. i WARN YOU LEAVE THE GREENS ALONE. OR FACE MY WRATH.

GREYWOLF.

you nod to Greywolf and everyone leaves you immediatly head on home, print out the image and address the envelope put in Greywolf's letter and photo and seal the envelope.
1541222211.title: Report to Greywolf

15412222111.content:
An angry Victor Gambell is on the phone "I don't care how, I need something that will eliminate Greywolf and his pack," He holds up the letter and photo that was sent to him "They managed to kill my best assassin and I need an idea. Oh? Okey I'm on my way." he stands up "Face your wrath eh Greywolf? Soon you'll know that I always get what I want, anyone who stands in my way will soon face the wrath of Victor Gambell!" He steps out his office.
____________________________________________________________________________ _________________________________

Gambell's limo soon pulls up to a toy store and as he enters, a sales man says "How may I help you sir?" Victor says "What do you have in a way with robots?" the sales man says "Ahh, the most popular choice. You'll find them in aisle 9." Victor goes to the robot aisle and pulls down an arm on one of the robots, a secret door opens up on the floor and he soon enters an elabrate robotics lab where he meets up with a man with horn rimmed eye glasses "Dr. Charles? I have a problem and it seems that you can help me solve it." Dr Charles says "Depends on the problem Mr. Gambell." "My wife and children have left me and I want them back. They live in a town called Wolf Haven and worse, they are under protection of a pack of werewolves who's alpha is called Greywolf, do you have anything that could help eliminate him and his pack?" asks Victor, "I have just the thing." says Dr, Charles as he picks up a remote the view soon changes to an LED display of the robot as it comes into view of Dr, Charles and Victor Gambell "I call it, cyberwolf. I could coat it's claws with silver if you like." Victor says "You got yourself a deal."

What now?
15412222111.title: Back at Gambell's

info.brief_description: You're a 15 year old werewolf in a world where werewolves are rarely seen.
info.description:
Prologue
You were walking in the forest. Everyone else is scared to go in there. It is rumoured there is a werewolf living in it. But you didn't beleive in werewolves. If they did live here, you would have seen them. As you walking you saw a wolf like creature running at you. You knew what it was. A werewolf. "Oh c**p," you say.

You run but the werewolf said, "Take this," and jump kicked you to the ground. He then jumped on you & pinned you to the ground. You muzzled him with your hands. He tried to get pull them off but you were holding very tight. He scratched your hand & you let go. You kicked him off you & you got up. You then had an all out fight. You were leading it when you kicked him to the ground. "Not bad. Instead killing you I will do this," he said. He then grappled you & bit you. You fell unconscious & he carried you somewhere.

When you woke up you noticed you were in a cave. You also noticed you had became a werewolf. You saw a note.

To human

You can see you are a werewolf. Enjoy your life

From
Greywolf




Story Rules:
The story happens one month after the Prologue
You cannot eat your family but other people you are more than welcome.
No sex, rape etc.
There are names to allow more than one story
No herms, shemales etc.
Enjoy writing


Please don't be shy to add
